H0.text: Which pop singer shot himself to death in 1990 whilst suffering from depression. Ian Curtis

H1.text: Which pop singer shot himself to death in 1990 whilst suffering from depression. Jimi Hendrix

H2.text: Which pop singer shot himself to death in 1990 whilst suffering from depression. Kurt Cobain

H3.text: Which pop singer shot himself to death in 1990 whilst suffering from depression. DEL SHANNON

A4.text: Fifteen days later, he died by suicide, shooting himself with a .22 caliber rifle at his home in Santa Clarita, California.

A5.text: He performed pop-rock tunes and old hits.
